Meeting Proposal at Foss4G Asia

 

Meeting Name : Indonesian GIS and Open Source technologies

 

Date and Venue : Dec 5,  11:00-12:00 (1h), W202, SERD Academic Building Floor2

Asian Institute of Technology

Remote Sensing and GIS(RSGIS)

P.O. Box4, Klong Luang,

Pathumthani 12120,Thailand

Instruction for Taxi

 

Purpose

Indonesian government is seeking a way to develop GIS applications in a public sector by using GIS open source and cloud technologies. This meeting is to share the issue with experts in open source community and to find an approach for the direction of Indonesian government through discussion with the professions.

 

Participants

Call for participants

 

Time Schedule (1h or 1.5h)

20 min  Presentation on “Introduction of Indonesian GIS”,

(Presenter: BADAN Informasi Geospatial, BIG)

10 min  Presentation on Requirement on building GIS App with Cloud Technologies

(Presenter: BADAN Informasi Geospatial, BIG)

30 min  Discussion and Action Plan for Further Collaboration

 

Contacts

Reni Setyowati (reni.setyowati@big.go.id)

Center for Geosptial Information Management and Dissemination

BADAN Informasi Geospatial(BIG)

(Indonesia Geosptial Information Agency)

Tel office: +62-21-8753366

Fax : +62-21-8753366

 

Haekyong Kang  (kang.krihs@gmail.com)

Associate Research Fellow, Ph.D in GIS

Geospatial Information Research Division

Korea Research Institute for Human Settlements
